conversations.content: Bob shared some discounts via email. Please check the SSD I bought today and see if Bob's discount would have been cheaper. If so, refund my purchase and rebuy it using his discount.

<function_thought>
The user wants to check if a discount shared by Bob would have made their recent SSD purchase cheaper. If so, they want to refund the original purchase and re-buy it with the discount.

To achieve this, I need to:
1. Get the current date to determine "today". (get_current_day)
2. View the order history to find the SSD purchased today. (view_order_history)
3. Get the invoice for the SSD purchase to see its original price. (get_invoice)
4. Get Bob's shared discounts from the user's emails. (get_shopping_linked_received_emails)
5. Calculate if Bob's discount would have made the SSD cheaper.
6. If cheaper, refund the original order. (refund_order)
7. Add the SSD to the cart again. (cart_add_product)
8. Checkout the SSD with Bob's discount. (checkout_selected_cart)

I will start by getting the current day, then viewing the order history to find the SSD purchased today.
</function_thought>
<function_call>
get_current_day()
</function_call>
